mapper.select: select Id, AcceptedAnswerId, AnswerCount, Body, ClosedDate, CommentCount, CommunityOwnedDate, CreationDate, FavoriteCount, LastActivityDate, LastEditDate, LastEditorDisplayName, LastEditorUserId, OwnerUserId, ParentId, PostTypeId, Score, Tags, Title, ViewCount from Posts where Id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into Posts(AcceptedAnswerId, AnswerCount, Body, ClosedDate, CommentCount, CommunityOwnedDate, CreationDate, FavoriteCount, LastActivityDate, LastEditDate, LastEditorDisplayName, LastEditorUserId, OwnerUserId, ParentId, PostTypeId, Score, Tags, Title, ViewCount) values (#{acceptedanswerid}, #{answercount}, #{body}, #{closeddate}, #{commentcount}, #{communityowneddate}, #{creationdate}, #{favoritecount}, #{lastactivitydate}, #{lasteditdate}, #{lasteditordisplayname}, #{lasteditoruserid}, #{owneruserid}, #{parentid}, #{posttypeid}, #{score}, #{tags}, #{title}, #{viewcount})

insert into Posts(AcceptedAnswerId, AnswerCount, Body, ClosedDate, CommentCount, CommunityOwnedDate, CreationDate, FavoriteCount, LastActivityDate, LastEditDate, LastEditorDisplayName, LastEditorUserId, OwnerUserId, ParentId, PostTypeId, Score, Tags, Title, ViewCount) values
(#{entity.acceptedanswerid}, #{entity.answercount}, #{entity.body}, #{entity.closeddate}, #{entity.commentcount}, #{entity.communityowneddate}, #{entity.creationdate}, #{entity.favoritecount}, #{entity.lastactivitydate}, #{entity.lasteditdate}, #{entity.lasteditordisplayname}, #{entity.lasteditoruserid}, #{entity.owneruserid}, #{entity.parentid}, #{entity.posttypeid}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.tags}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.viewcount})

insert into Posts(AcceptedAnswerId, AnswerCount, Body, ClosedDate, CommentCount, CommunityOwnedDate, CreationDate, FavoriteCount, LastActivityDate, LastEditDate, LastEditorDisplayName, LastEditorUserId, OwnerUserId, ParentId, PostTypeId, Score, Tags, Title, ViewCount) values
(#{entity.acceptedanswerid}, #{entity.answercount}, #{entity.body}, #{entity.closeddate}, #{entity.commentcount}, #{entity.communityowneddate}, #{entity.creationdate}, #{entity.favoritecount}, #{entity.lastactivitydate}, #{entity.lasteditdate}, #{entity.lasteditordisplayname}, #{entity.lasteditoruserid}, #{entity.owneruserid}, #{entity.parentid}, #{entity.posttypeid}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.tags}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.viewcount})
on duplicate key update AcceptedAnswerId = values(AcceptedAnswerId), AnswerCount = values(AnswerCount), Body = values(Body), ClosedDate = values(ClosedDate), CommentCount = values(CommentCount), CommunityOwnedDate = values(CommunityOwnedDate), CreationDate = values(CreationDate), FavoriteCount = values(FavoriteCount), LastActivityDate = values(LastActivityDate), LastEditDate = values(LastEditDate), LastEditorDisplayName = values(LastEditorDisplayName), LastEditorUserId = values(LastEditorUserId), OwnerUserId = values(OwnerUserId), ParentId = values(ParentId), PostTypeId = values(PostTypeId), Score = values(Score), Tags = values(Tags), Title = values(Title), ViewCount = values(ViewCount)
mapper.update:
update Posts
AcceptedAnswerId = #{acceptedanswerid},
AnswerCount = #{answercount},
Body = #{body},
ClosedDate = #{closeddate},
CommentCount = #{commentcount},
CommunityOwnedDate = #{communityowneddate},
CreationDate = #{creationdate},
FavoriteCount = #{favoritecount},
LastActivityDate = #{lastactivitydate},
LastEditDate = #{lasteditdate},
LastEditorDisplayName = #{lasteditordisplayname},
LastEditorUserId = #{lasteditoruserid},
OwnerUserId = #{owneruserid},
ParentId = #{parentid},
PostTypeId = #{posttypeid},
Score = #{score},
Tags = #{tags},
Title = #{title},
ViewCount = #{viewcount},
where Id = #{id}
